Live out scenes straight from your favorite slasher movies in Dead by Daylight, a 4v1 horror game where one player assumes the role of a psychotic killer and the four remaining players must escape the killing ground. Survivors play in third-person view, allowing them to hide and survey the environment, while the killer stalks them in first-person. Maps are procedurally-generated so even veterans will have to relearn the maps to survive. As a Survivor, use tall grass, lockers, crates and barricades to carefully navigate the killing ground. Remain calm and tactical. Panic is a sure way to get killed. Discover and utilize items to aid in your survival or team up with other players to outwit the monster. As the Killer, predict Survivor movements and use a myriad of sinister abilities to trap them and offer them up as sacrifices to the Entity.

[u]Dead by Daylight Key Features:[/u]

[b]Progression[/b] - in-game characters have a deep progression system which can be customized  for unique strategies.

[b]Items[/b] - search the killing grounds to discover items that will aid you in survival or carry them with you to your next match.

[b]First-Person Killer[/b] - the killer's camera is confined to the first-person while survivors are given a third-person view to help them evade the monster.

[b]Procedural Levels[/b] - each game requires players to relearn the environment so that no experienced player can gain a significant advantage from map awareness.

[b]Multiple Killers[/b] - choose to play one of several iconic horror movie motifs, from the slasher to the silent wraith.

The game is a joke and it has turned several iconic horror franchises into a joke. It isn't a "horror game". All that will happen is the killer will get chased around pallets for 5 minutes and will be lucky to get 1 kill (unless they camp) because of survivors' second-chance per... crutches*. 

When the survivors win based solely off of BS they will go: "gg. noob. git gud. ezpz."

If you camp or use the few powerful killer perks they'll go: "camper! KYS. mad cuz bad. report him! uninstall."

That is just a few examples of how broken and inbalanced the game is. And the devs refuse to do anything about it. 

The forums are just constant cesspools of toxicity filled with civil wars against both sides of the community. 

The killer community is constantly bigoted and ostracised and discriminated against and censored by the forum mods.
Killer players or anti-survivor members on the forums are banned as soon as possible because they do not meet the devs' criteria.

The gameplay and idea is great. Similar to the game Evolve except less complicated.
However the game is incredibly buggy. Uses P2P which can cause some serious lag and some cheaters, (lag switch, etc).
The multiplayer (survive with friends) mathmaking is pretty broken sometimes waiting 30 minutes or more to join the game. You have better luck playing with your friends by finding them in a regular lobby.
Bugs and all i still recommend this game.

The game itself is great but 

1st the player that act like a loser is ruin the game. I undergo the situation that killer can't kill anyone then DC [rage quit] or survivor DC when the got hook and you got no blood point[use for unlock perk or items] after match. It's not I undergo this only one match but it's happen all of the time. Seem like dev ignore this issue and do nothing about it.

2nd This game don't have dedicate server. the killer is the host so you can experince lagging [hard to play] and sometime you can't even play that match [If you play as survivor]. there is no ping indicator ingame. so it's depend on your luck. the odd is 1-3 out of 10 match. 

all above is rank match.
So I don't recommend you to play this game until dev fix it.


Ps.  If you only play with your friends both killer and survivor [not rank match] I think it's ok. but you got no Bloodpoints  from this mode.
